skillTree.localised_description: Archaon is a poser, a fake, a fraud. For SLAMBO is the Everchosen, the Everchampion, the First True Prince of Chaos.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for Chaos Chosen units
	(all units in army)

Physical resistance: 12% for Chaos Chosen units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sigvald cries himself to sleep looking not at a mirror, but the unholy perfection of SLAMBO.
Whenever the sky darkens with cloud and thunder rumbles on the horizon, Kholek shivers in fear, for he knows the legend of SLAMBO.

effects.description:
Attrition: +10% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when laying siege or encircling
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Look at Skarbrand, crying because Daddy put him on the naughty step. SLAMBO has never graced the naughty step with his presence!

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +35% after winning a battle

skillTree.localised_description: Yes, yes, N'Kari, you're a little bit appealing. But all manner of creatures lay down before SLAMBO, for he is the true God of Excess.

target_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Mr. Clean gets rid of dirt and grime and grease in just a minute. Mr. Clean will clean your whole house and everything that's in it.

effects.description:
Growth per region: +5 after winning a battle
	(all provinces)

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Infested Nurglings
Summoned unit can self-destruct in an explosion

skillTree.localised_description: Kairos might be able to see the past and the future, but it is the present in which SLAMBO exists! You can't see me!
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Am the mightiest!
Indomitable!
Most potent!
Warrior!
Champion!
By all the gods!
The glory of Slambo is made in eternal combat, and nothing and no one shall keep him from throwing himself into the madness of endless war.

ui_effects.localised_text: Increases this unit's ability to knock enemies back while active

stat_effects.description: x0.025 Dealt Collision Knocked Back Threshold
x0.022 Dealt Collision Knocked Down Threshold
x0.02 Dealt Collision Knocked Flying Threshold

skillTree.localised_description: First and greatest champion of Chaos, Slambo is a warrior without equal. Those who stand in his way merely add to the tally that he claims.
"What fools these creatures are, thinking to challenge the Everchampion."
Blessed by all four of the Chaos gods (if not one of them himself), Slambo is not constrained by things such as reality when he wields his Glory-Seeking Axes.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_name: Everchosen, Everchampion, First True Prince of Chaos
backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Everchosen, the First True Prince of Chaos, the Everchampion; Slambo is the greatest warrior to ever don the mantle of the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -10
	(enemy armies in local region)
